mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string != modified_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('', '', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string == modified_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', 'MUTATED', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string == modified_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string == modified_string[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string == modified_string[::-2]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string == modified_string[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string == modified_string[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    modified_string = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', string)
    modified_string = modified_string.lower()
    return modified_string == modified_string[::--1]
